txt.en: A Guide to Adventuring as a Champion

Bring on the foe! The Champion revels in the thick of battle, hacking and slashing his way through throngs of enemies. Your attacks often hit multiple opponents, dealing terrible damage. In order to maximize your impact in a fight, you will want to start with attacks and abilities that build up fervour. Fervour can then be expended to unleash deadly attacks upon those who stand in your way.

If you wish to live to tell your grandchildren of your days in battle, you will need to become very comfortable with assessing just how much of a challenge you are facing in a given fight. Adjusting your stance is the best way to make sure that you are prepared to take down your foe without leaving yourself too open to counterattacks.

-T.
